name: Crazy Driller
description:
Welcome to the world of Crazy Driller!

Click arrow button to control the drilling machine and avoid lava block. The deeper you dig, the more rewards you get.

- Drill bit: Crushing obstacles and detonate lava block.

- Engine: Providing acceleration and steering force for rig.

- Laser: Melting obstacles.

- Freezer: For cooling, avoiding drill overheating and burning.


We need collect gold to create new equipment.

Drill bit, engine and laser will generate heat. The drilling machine will blow up when the heat is too high. We can reduce the drilling machine's temperature by creating freezers.

If the drill machine move or rotate slowly, we need to increase engines.Otherwise the flowing magma from top will catch us up and destroy the drilling machine.
